Package VMF

Class VendingMachine

java.lang.Object
VMF.VendingMachine
Direct Known Subclasses:
FriedRiceVM
public class VendingMachine extends Object
The VendingMachine class represents a vending machine that contains slots to hold items, manages money, and facilitates buying and restocking operations.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    ArrayList<Integer>
    initializedSlots
    An ArrayList that keeps track of the initialized slots in the vending machine.
    protected boolean
    isSpecial
    A flag indicating whether the vending machine is a special vending machine or not.

  • Field Details

    • isSpecial

      protected boolean isSpecial
      A flag indicating whether the vending machine is a special vending machine or not. Default value is false.

    • initializedSlots

      public ArrayList<Integer> initializedSlots
      An ArrayList that keeps track of the initialized slots in the vending machine.

  • Constructor Details

    • VendingMachine

      public VendingMachine(String machineName, int numSlots, int slotCapacity)
      Constructs a new VendingMachine object with the specified machine name, number of slots, and slot capacity.
      Parameters:
      machineName - the name of the vending machine
      numSlots - the number of slots in the vending machine
      slotCapacity - the maximum capacity of each slot

  • Method Details

    • getSlot

      public FrmSlot getSlot(int slotChoice)
      Returns the FrmSlot object at the specified slot choice.
      Parameters:
      slotChoice - the slot choice
      Returns:
      the FrmSlot object at the specified slot choice

    • getAllSlots

      public ArrayList<FrmSlot> getAllSlots()
      Returns all the slots in the vending machine.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of all the FrmSlots in the vending machine

    • replenishChange

      public void replenishChange(Float denomination, int quantity)
      Replenishes the money in the vending machine with the specified denomination and quantity.
      Parameters:
      denomination - the denomination of the money
      quantity - the quantity of the money to replenish

    • canGiveChange

      public boolean canGiveChange(float change)
      Checks if it is possible to give change for the specified amount using the available denominations.
      Parameters:
      change - the amount of change to be given
      Returns:
      true if it is possible to give change, false otherwise

    • returnMoney

      public ArrayList<Float> returnMoney(float amount)
      Returns the money with the specified amount to the money manager.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount of money to be returned
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of denominations that were returned

      Parameters:

      newPrice - the new price to set
      Throws:
      InterruptedException - if the thread sleep is interrupted
